title: Markets, ETFs, Travel, And Top Gun (Podcast)
itunes:title: Markets, ETFs, Travel, And Top Gun (Podcast)
description:
Ross Mayfield, Chief Investment Strategist at Baird Private Wealth Management, talks about markets and investing strategies. Katie Greifeld, cross asset reporter with Bloomberg News, discusses her recent piece on the ETF boom being fueled by the existential crisis in bonds. Alisha Kapur, Senior Industry Manager at Similarweb, talks about travel in 2022 and ahead of July 4th weekend. Mark Douglas, CEO of MNTN, talks about Top Gun’s big box office earnings and streaming. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
